00019 #ifndef _EARLY_LATE_SYNCH_HPP_cm131129_
00020 #define _EARLY_LATE_SYNCH_HPP_cm131129_
00021 
00022 #include <algorithm>
00023 #include <cmath>
00024 #include <numeric>
00025 #include <iostream>
00026 #include <vector>
00027 
00028 #include <boost/circular_buffer.hpp>
00029 namespace demod {
00030 
00031   class early_late_synch {
00032   public:
00033     typedef boost::circular_buffer<int> hist_type;
00034 
00035     early_late_synch(double period)
00036     : alpha_(0.5)
00037     , period_(period)
00038     , two_periods_(2*lround(period))
00039     , counter_(0)
00040     , t_(two_periods_)
00041     , err_(0)
00042     , history_(two_periods_)
00043     , bit_valid_(false)
00044     , current_bit_(false) {}
00045 
00046     double period() const { return period_; }
00047 
00048     bool bit_valid() const { return bit_valid_; }
00049     bool current_bit() const { return current_bit_; }
00050 
00051     void insert_signal(double s) {
00052       if (counter_ == floor(t_)) {
00053         bit_valid_ = true;
00054         current_bit_ = history_[two_periods_/4] > 0;
00055         // history_[floor(t_-two_periods_)] > 0  -> bit
00056         //  ==> history_.front
00057         const double early(std::accumulate(history_.begin(), history_.begin()+two_periods_/2, 0.));
00058         const double late (std::accumulate(history_.begin()+two_periods_/2, history_.end(),   0.));
00059         err_     = (1-alpha_)*err_ - alpha_*(std::abs(early) - std::abs(late));
00060         // std::cout << "t_,err= " << t_ << " " << err_ << std::endl;
00061         t_      += period_ - counter_ + 0.5*err_;
00062         counter_ = 0;
00063       } else
00064         bit_valid_ = false;
00065 
00066       history_.push_back(2*(s>0) - 1);
00067       ++counter_;
00068     }
00069 
00070   protected:
00071 
00072   private:
00073     double    alpha_;
00074     double    period_;
00075     size_t    two_periods_;
00076     size_t    counter_;
00077     double    t_;
00078     double    err_;
00079     hist_type history_;  
00080     bool      bit_valid_;
00081     bool      current_bit_;
00082   } ;
00083 
00084 } // namespace demod
00085 #endif // _EARLY_LATE_SYNCH_HPP_cm131129_
